thread.title: BRIEF-Beni Stabili: Conversion Of Bonds Into Ordinary Shares To be Suspended

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beni Stabili: Conversion Of Bonds Into Ordinary Shares To be Suspended
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Beni Stabili:
* SAID ON MONDAY TO HOLD BOARD OF DIRECTORS MEETING ON FEB 6
* EXERCISE OF OPTION TO CONVERT EUR 200 MLN BONDS DUE 2021 INTO ORDINARY SHARES SHALL BE SUSPENDED FROM FEB.6 UP TO AND ON DATE SET FOR THE SHAREHOLDERâ€™S GENERAL MEETING
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
